metadata.title: CVE-2018-19045 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
keepalived 2.0.8 used mode 0666 when creating new temporary files upon acall to PrintData or PrintStats, potentially leaking sensitive information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

keepalived - 1:2.0.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keepalived package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.10-1').
